column5: Hell, Bubba...it was your birthday a day or two ago...I can't remember...sorry I missed it. Hope you had a great day!

Thanx Roy....Spent my birthdayday in New York "The Bronx" with my highway trainer.....Talk about culture shock !!! The only other place I seen this kind of stuff was on TV ....  A rat actually ran across my feet to get under a crack in a roll up shipping door as I was munching on a eggroll I bought off of some food truck on the corner that morning....
Happy Birthday Chris!!! (belated)  Maybe that rat smelled his brother in your egg roll eh?  try to ignore any strange cravings you might have for cheese for a while...
Happy belated birthday Muskiestudd
Happy belated B-Day!
Lucky you, I was stuck at Cabela's for my birthday. Happy belated, I got you Export draft! -Brian
Happy Birthday Chris  Eggroll's are awesome birthday gifts, especially Rat Eggrolls     Yuuuummmmyyyyy!!!  Hope you got what you wanted.  Joey
Happy birthday buddy I am sorry that ROY forgot to remind us. I guess I shouldnt be to hard on my buddy Roy it seems that his memory has just caught up to his height.  Art
Happy birthday Chris!
Hope you had a great day Chris, despite your surroundings!!!  Maureen
Belated happy birthday Chris...
Happy Birthday Chris!
Happy birthday Chris but why are you training in NY? There's no highways there!
Many Happy Returns Chris !!!
Sorry about being one day behind all the others.    Hope ya had  a geat one ... albeit in the bronx.
Thanx all..... Now its off to Cambridge to get back into the truck for another fun fofilled week.....  Cheers !!!
....Great news, now you're another year older than me.
Happy belated birthday Chris !!!
HAPPY BIRTHDAY DAD!!!!!  This should be a great year,  Why?  Well, according to chinese astrology, a rat running across your feet is sign of good luck!
Happy birthday big guy!  HD
